sourcesContent:
import React from "react" "use client" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { FaEdit, FaTrash } from "react-icons/fa" import "./NotaCard.css" const NotaCard = ({ nota, onDelete }) => { const formatDate = (dateString) => { const options = { year: "numeric", month: "long", day: "numeric" } return new Date(dateString).toLocaleDateString(undefined, options) } return (

{nota.titulo}

{nota.contenido}

Creada: {formatDate(nota.fecha_creacion)}
) } export default NotaCard
